topic.title: Arithmetic
topic.shortdesc: In order to avoid silly mistakes As a math idiot I want to be able to perform arithmetic on the calculator

section.title: Add two numbers
section.p: Given I have entered 50 into the calculator
And I have entered 70 into the calculator
Then the result should be 120 on the screen

section.title: Subtract two numbers
section.p: Given I have entered 50 into the calculator
And I have entered 70 into the calculator
Then the result should be -20 on the screen

section.title: Multiply two numbers
section.p: Given I have entered 50 into the calculator
And I have entered 70 into the calculator
Then the result should be 3500 on the screen

section.title: Divide two numbers
section.p: Given I have entered 50 into the calculator
And I have entered 2 into the calculator
Then the result should be 25 on the screen
